meanings.definition: A South African plant with white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The chincherinchee bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I planted a chincherinchee in my backyard for its lovely flowers.
meanings.sent3: The chincherinchee seemed to dance in the breeze, showing off its white blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pure and delicate as a chincherinchee in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the chincherinchee filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: I planted the chincherinchee bulb carefully in the soil.
meanings.sent2: The chincherinchee bulb sprouted new shoots in the spring.
meanings.sent3: When I dug up the chincherinchee bulb, it looked like a tiny onion.
meanings.sent4: The chincherinchee bulb held the promise of new life beneath the earth.
meanings.sent5: The chincherinchee bulb was round and firm, ready to grow into a beautiful flower.

meanings.sent1: The delicate chincherinchee brightened up the bouquet.
meanings.sent2: She picked a chincherinchee to add to her vase of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The chincherinchee looked like a tiny star among the other blooms.
meanings.sent4: The chincherinchee stood out with its pure white petals in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The chincherinchee's petals were as soft as a gentle breeze.
